query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `alert_channels` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `channel_type` enum('email', 'sms', 'push', 'webhook') NOT NULL,
  `config` json NOT NULL,
  `is_active` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `alert_channels_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `alert_rules` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `description` text,
  `conditions` json NOT NULL,
  `severity` enum('critical', 'high', 'medium', 'low') NOT NULL,
  `channels` json NOT NULL,
  `is_active` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `alert_rules_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `audit_logs` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `user_id` int,
  `action` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `category` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `resource` varchar(255),
  `resource_id` varchar(100),
  `status` enum('success', 'failure', 'denied') NOT NULL,
  `ip_address` varchar(45),
  `user_agent` text,
  `details` json,
  `timestamp` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `audit_logs_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `audit_log_categories` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  `description` text,
  `retention_days` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 90,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `audit_log_categories_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `remediation_workflows` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `description` text,
  `trigger_conditions` json NOT NULL,
  `actions` json NOT NULL,
  `priority` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 5,
  `is_active` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `created_by` int NOT NULL,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `remediation_workflows_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `remediation_actions` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `action_type` enum('block_ip', 'suspend_account', 'send_notification', 'webhook') NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `description` text,
  `config` json NOT NULL,
  `is_active` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `remediation_actions_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `remediation_executions` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `workflow_id` int NOT NULL,
  `alert_id` int,
  `status` enum('pending', 'running', 'completed', 'failed') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `triggered_by` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `executed_actions` json,
  `error_message` text,
  `started_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `completed_at` timestamp,
  CONSTRAINT `remediation_executions_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);
